_sText:
--------------------- Surf_hang_time_reloaded Reload of surf_hang_time_v2 Original by ZALOS Reload by Buck Nasty --------------------- This map is truly a classic that I did not want to see die. Thanks to ZALOS for letting me "reload" his map. Fixes: - Started all weapons constrained (can't grenade the pile of nades which cause lag @ spawn). - Fixed the bomb zone so that when the bomb explodes the game does not lag until the next round. - Added ammo to all guns. - Replaced the blinding marble tile and bright blue glass texture to something not so harsh. - Pretty much cleaned up most of all the sections. I did not smooth out the all ramps because I wanted to keep the old school feel of this map. ------------------------------------------------------------------------- ZALOS' Overview of the map:
Posted by ZALOS The goal of this map for me was to make big Surf and hopefully make it so you could kill your oppenents while surfing. I also didnt put in a buy zone so those that got to certian areas were rewarded with certian guns. The map is divided into 5 sections. 1. Spawn, it looks kinda like a "S" it is made so in a way that if you have enough speed you can make a loop and essentially run around in circles forever. I did this so you could make multiple passes at someone or chase people around. This is also a way to get to spawn. 2. Section 2 is just some surfing with a big ramp start that squeeeeezes into some smaller ramps, at the end is a teleport to the next section and guns. 3. Section 3 is a huge surf that can bring you head on into the oppenent. At the bottom is the bombsite and teleports to spawn/jail. 4. Jail- Jail has 5 entrances where you teleport in than surf to the inside, if you fall off the surf you get tped to the middle. 5. There are secrets and a pro area. :D -ZALOS-
------------------------------------------------------------------------- There are many more asthetic changes to this map which are not completely visible in the screenshots, so I suggest you download the map and try it out. Thanks again to ZALOS, all credit goes to you! ----------------------------------- Enjoy! -- Buck Nasty http://solidsurf.info/ http://www.waspnest.net/ -----------------------------------
